name: DataRow

constructors.name: DataRow
constructors.signature: public DataRow(String label, Object value, Boolean selected)
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the VisualEditor.DataRow class using the specified label, value, and selected option.

params.name: selected
params.description: User-facing label for the picklist item. The value of the picklist item. Specifies whether the picklist item is selected (true) or not (false).

constructors.name: DataRow
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the VisualEditor.DataRow class using the specified label and value.

params.name: value
params.description: User-facing label for the picklist item. The value of the picklist item.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the VisualEditor.DataRow object.

methods.name: compareTo
methods.description: Compares the current VisualEditor.DataRow object to the specified one. Returns an integer value that is the result of the comparison.

params.name: o
params.description: A single item in a picklist.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the user-facing label of the picklist item.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the value of the picklist item.

methods.name: isSelected
methods.description: Returns the state of the picklist item, indicating whether itâ€™s selected or not.

description: Contains information about one item in a picklist used in a Lightning component on a Lightning page.
